- 1 6 p b n o AM -2 6 a u m 1 2 ]
3- (pb, aum) 6x [18] 4 a 7- 18pb (4 carr) 8- (pb, dim) 6x [12] 9e10- 12pb(2carr) 11-(2pb, dim) 3x [9] Arremate.
Corpo
Agulha 1.5 e fio Amigurumi Pelúcia
19
Fio da cor escolhida para trabalhar a lã da ovelha, caso opte em trabalhar com fio de algodão, trabalhe as carreiras em BLO, e depois trabalhe a lã (em cada alça livre, faça pb, 2corr, pb no próximo pt).
Patas 4x Agulha 1.25 e fio Bella fashion
1- 5pb no AM
-2 5aum [10]
3e-4 10pb(2carr)
Arremate, deixe um fio longo para costurar no corpo
Cabeça
Agulha 1.25 e fio Bella fashion
-1 - 8 corr, a partir da 2°corr: aum, 5pb, 4pb no ultimo pt, 5pb, aum [18]
trans:
• Colours:
Bella fashion yarn
0004 - NATURAL or
0243 - WATERCOLOR Amigurumi plush yarn
8001 - WHITE or
7567 - COCOA
All rights reserved to [redacted_name] and [redacted_email], 2023
- 16 sl st on magic ring - 26 inc 12 ]
3 - (sc, inc) 6x [18] 4 to 7 - sc(4 rows) 8 - (sc, dim) 6x [12] 9 and 10 - 12sc(2rows) 11-(sc, dim) 3x [9] Fasten off.
Body
Use a 1.5mm hook and amigurumi plush yarn
19
Choose a color for the sheep's wool. If using cotton yarn, work in rows, then crochet the wool (in each chain space, sc, 2 chain, sc in the next stitch).
Feet 4x 1.25 hook and Bella fashion yarn:
1 - 5 sc on magic ring
-2 5 inc [10]
3 and 4 10 sc(2 row)
Fasten off, leaving a long tail for sewing
Head
Use a 1.25 hook and Bella fashion yarn
-1 -8 row, starting in the 2nd chain: inc, 5 sc, 4 sc in the last stitch, 5 sc, inc [18 total]
